relation: End2End reduces the complexity of SMS by providing connections to more than 380 mobile, and selected fixed line operators around the world � through a single point of connection through End2End. By outsourcing SMS transport to End2End, you can concentrate on your core business and still reliably reach mobile users around the world. End2End has connectivity to 380+ operators through a single gateway.

Allows companies, businesses and individuals to have their own 'SMS Gateway', providing the opportunity to create SMS messages directly from a standard PC connected to the Internet. You will have the chance to promote and communicate different services, products or websites and to even resell your SMS messages.
